article: david santiago , a community advocate who fought for black and hispanic access to new york city public housing projects in williamsburg , brooklyn , in the ####s , and who more recently coordinated protests against the u.s. military presence in vieques , died on sept. ## in fairfax , va. , near his home in annandale , va. .
